description:
Radix is looking to hire an experienced Business Development and Partnerships professional to drive strategic partnership deals in the US.

What is the job like?
• Establish a systematic process for partner outreach and conversation strategy
• Negotiate and finalize deals with partners and alliances that benefit the company
• Develop and execute marketing strategies that grow mutual value through partnerships
• Develop strategic relationships in sync with organizational goals
• Attend conferences and networking events on behalf of the company
• Explore newer ways to grow current partnerships.

Who should apply for this role ?
• Should have 6+ years of experience preferably in consultative selling, digital media industry, influencer industry, brand consulting
• Should have a Bachelor’s degree or higher equivalent
• Is entrepreneurial, a motivated self-starter. Hustles independently without the need for supervision
• Has a natural gift of storytelling and is a keen observer for opportunities
• Ability to analyze, innovate and think creatively
• Familiarity with SEO and domain names will be an added advantage

Directi focuses on E-Commerce, Advertising, Text Analytics, and Communications Software. Their company has offices in Bengaluru and Mumbai. They have a very large team that's between 1001-5000 employees.

You can view their website at http://directi.com or find them on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
